lead_paragraph: Statistical studies suggest that immigrants to the United States commit fewer crimes than natives, despite claims to the contrary by some politicians.
snippet: Statistical studies suggest that immigrants to the United States commit fewer crimes than natives, despite claims to the contrary by some politicians.

headline.main: Research Doesn’t Back a Link Between Migrants and Crime in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Data Link Immigrants to Low Rates of Crime

abstract: Report issued by American Immigration Council finds immigrants in United States are much more law-abiding than natural-born citizens, regardless of race, class or education.
